It's so dirty in here.$s"/pause 500/warp farmer 13 24/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer -1 0 3/move farmer 0 -14 0/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/emote Penny 16/pause 300/speak Penny "@! Um... Sorry that it's such a mess. I was about to clean up.$u"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 600/emote Penny 32/pause 300/speak Penny "You'll help me? You really mean it?$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Penny "Okay, you can get started over there. I'll clean the kitchen."/move farmer 2 0 1/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 1 0 1/move Penny -1 0 0/animate Penny false true 100 24 25/animate farmer false true 100 35/pause 200/playSound dwop/removeSprite 16 6/pause 200/move Penny -1 0 0/animate Penny false true 100 24 25/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 1200/stopAnimation Penny/removeSprite 10 5/playSound dwop/move Penny -1 0 0/animate Penny false true 100 24 25/pause 900/animate farmer false true 100 41/pause 300/playSound dwop/removeSprite 15 5/stopAnimation farmer/pause 1400/stopAnimation Penny/move Penny 1 0 0/pause 800/warp Pam 13 24/playSound doorClose/move Pam 0 -1 0/move Pam -1 0 3/move Pam 0 -15 0/stopMusic/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Pam 1/pause 500/faceDirection Pam 3/speak Pam "Whaddya think you're doing?!$u"/faceDirection Pam 1/faceDirection Pam 3/faceDirection Pam 0/speak Pam "Stop it! I had everything just the way I like it!$u"/move Penny 2 0 2/pause 500/emote Penny 28/pause 500/speak Penny "Mom, the house is a total mess. @ and I were just trying to tidy things up a bit.#$b#*sniff* *sniff*... Were you at the saloon just now? You smell like beer...$s"/pause 300/move Pam -1 0 3/emote Pam 12/pause 400/speak Pam "It's none of your damn business where I go!$4"/pause 500/speak Penny "It IS my business! I don't want you destroying yourself!$a#$b#Don't you realize your choices have an effect on me? Stop being so selfish!$a"/faceDirection Pam 0/shake Pam 5000/pause 600/speak Pam "Selfish? I put a roof over your head and clothes on your back and you call me selfish!? You ungrateful little...$u"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection Pam 1/faceDirection Penny 1/move farmer -2 0 2/move farmer 0 2 3/pause 500/speak Pam "You'd better go. I'm sorry you had to see this, kid.$4"/pause 500/move farmer 0 3 2/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 700/move farmer 0 13 2/warp farmer -40 -40/playSound doorClose/pause 500/move Pam 0 -1 1/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 3/speak Pam "He's a nice young man...^She's a nice young lady..."/speak Pam "But I don't want you tellin' others to clean up my house! It's embarrassing! You understand?$4"/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 600/showFrame Penny 23/pause 700/speak Penny "...Yes, mother.$s"/pause 1000/mail PennyCleanTrailer/end warpOut
Entries.36/f Penny 1500: musicboxsong/9 7/farmer -30 30 0 Penny 9 7 0/skippable/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 13 24/move farmer 0 -15 0/pause 400/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 300/speak Penny "@, you came at a good time!#$b#I'm just about finished cooking a new recipe I invented!$h"/pause 400/move farmer 0 -2 3/faceDirection Penny 1/move farmer -3 0 3/speak Penny "Let me just finish up real quick."/pause 200/faceDirection Penny 0/pause 200/animate Penny false true 120 29 30/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/stopAnimation Penny/pause 500/playSound openBox/showFrame Penny 29/pause 400/playSound furnace/showFrame Penny 30/pause 1500/playSound clank/faceDirection Penny 0/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1 true/showFrame Penny 28/speak Penny "Here, give that a little taste."/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/farmerEat 200/showFrame Penny 4/pause 2500/stopAnimation farmer/pause 500/playSound gulp/animate farmer false true 350 104 105/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite pennyCook/pause 1500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/speak Penny "$q 72 null#...well?#$r 72 50 event_cook1#(Lie) Mmm! That was delicious!#$r 73 -50 event_cook2#Uh... can I get the rest to go?#$r 73 0 event_cook3#Well it's definitely unique... how did you get it so rubbery?"/pause 500/speak Penny "$p 72#Hey, since you're the first person to try it, I'm going to name this one 'Chili de @'.$h|Well, I guess this recipe was a failure...$s"/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 600/speak Penny "Um... so how about we watch a movie or something?"/pause 500/move farmer 5 0 0 true/move Penny 5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Penny "Thanks for being my taste-tester.$h"

Entries.35/f Penny 1000: 50s/-1000 -1000/farmer -30 30 0 Penny 12 7 0 Pam -100 -100 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite pennyMess/viewport 12 7 true/pause 1000/speak Penny "Bäh... Es ist so dreckig hier drin.$s"/pause 500/warp farmer 13 24/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer -1 0 3/move farmer 0 -14 0/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/emote Penny 16/pause 300/speak Penny "@! Äh... Entschuldige, dass es so unordentlich ist. Ich war gerade dabei, alles sauber zu machen.$u"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 600/emote Penny 32/pause 300/speak Penny "Du hilfst mir? Du sagst das nicht nur so, oder?$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Penny "Okay, du kannst da drüben anfangen. Ich mach die Küche sauber."/move farmer 2 0 1/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 1 0 1/move Penny -1 0 0/animate Penny false true 100 24 25/animate farmer false true 100 35/pause 200/playSound dwop/removeSprite 16 6/pause 200/move Penny -1 0 0/animate Penny false true 100 24 25/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 1200/stopAnimation Penny/removeSprite 10 5/playSound dwop/move Penny -1 0 0/animate Penny false true 100 24 25/pause 900/animate farmer false true 100 41/pause 300/playSound dwop/removeSprite 15 5/stopAnimation farmer/pause 1400/stopAnimation Penny/move Penny 1 0 0/pause 800/warp Pam 13 24/playSound doorClose/move Pam 0 -1 0/move Pam -1 0 3/move Pam 0 -15 0/stopMusic/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Pam 1/pause 500/faceDirection Pam 3/speak Pam "Was machst du da?!$u"/faceDirection Pam 1/faceDirection Pam 3/faceDirection Pam 0/speak Pam "Hör sofort auf! Ich hatte alles genauso, wie ich es mag!$u"/move Penny 2 0 2/pause 500/emote Penny 28/pause 500/speak Penny "Mutter, das Haus ist ein totaler Saustall. @ und ich wollten nur ein wenig aufräumen.#$b#*schnief* *schnief*... Warst du gerade in der Kneipe? Du riechst nach Bier...$s"/pause 300/move Pam -1 0 3/emote Pam 12/pause 400/speak Pam "Es geht dich absolut nichts an, wo ich hingehe!$4"/pause 500/speak Penny "Es geht mich WOHL was an! Ich will nicht, dass du dich selbst zerstörst!$a#$b#Verstehst du nicht, dass sich dein Verhalten auch auf mich auswirkt? Hör auf, so egoistisch zu sein!$a"/faceDirection Pam 0/shake Pam 5000/pause 600/speak Pam "Egoistisch? Ich habe dir ein Dach über dem Kopf und Kleidung gegeben und du nennst mich egoistisch?! Du undankbares kleines...$u"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection Pam 1/faceDirection Penny 1/move farmer -2 0 2/move farmer 0 2 3/pause 500/speak Pam "Du gehst besser. Es tut mir leid, dass du das sehen musstest, Kind.$4"/pause 500/move farmer 0 3 2/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 700/move farmer 0 13 2/warp farmer -40 -40/playSound doorClose/pause 500/move Pam 0 -1 1/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 3/speak Pam "Er ist ein netter junger Mann...^Sie ist eine nette junge Frau..."/speak Pam "Aber ich will nicht, dass du andere bittest mein Haus aufzuräumen! Es ist peinlich! Verstehst du?$4"/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 600/showFrame Penny 23/pause 700/speak Penny "... Ja, Mutter.$s"/pause 1000/mail PennyCleanTrailer/end warpOut

Na?#$r 72 50 event_cook1#(lügen) Mmmh! Das war lecker!#$r 73 -50 event_cook2#Äh... kann ich den Rest mitnehmen?#$r 73 0 event_cook3#Nun, es ist auf jeden Fall... einzigartig... Wie hast du es so gummiartig hinbekommen?"/pause 500/speak Penny "$p 72#Hey, weil du die erste Person bist, die es probiert hat, nenne ich es 'Chili de @'.$h|Dieses Rezept war dann wohl ein Fehlschlag...$s"/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 600/speak Penny "Ähm... wie wäre es, wenn wir einen Film oder so schauen?"/pause 500/move farmer 5 0 0 true/move Penny 5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Penny "Danke, dass du mein Vorkoster warst.$h"

Qué sucio está todo esto.$s"/pause 500/warp farmer 13 24/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer -1 0 3/move farmer 0 -14 0/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/emote Penny 16/pause 300/speak Penny "¡@! Estaba a punto de limpiar.$u"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 600/emote Penny 32/pause 300/speak Penny "¿Vas a ayudarme? ¿Lo dices de verdad?$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Penny "Vale, pues empieza por ahí. Yo limpiaré la cocina."/move farmer 2 0 1/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 1 0 1/move Penny -1 0 0/animate Penny false true 100 24 25/animate farmer false true 100 35/pause 200/playSound dwop/removeSprite 16 6/pause 200/move Penny -1 0 0/animate Penny false true 100 24 25/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 1200/stopAnimation Penny/removeSprite 10 5/playSound dwop/move Penny -1 0 0/animate Penny false true 100 24 25/pause 900/animate farmer false true 100 41/pause 300/playSound dwop/removeSprite 15 5/stopAnimation farmer/pause 1400/stopAnimation Penny/move Penny 1 0 0/pause 800/warp Pam 13 24/playSound doorClose/move Pam 0 -1 0/move Pam -1 0 3/move Pam 0 -15 0/stopMusic/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Pam 1/pause 500/faceDirection Pam 3/speak Pam "¡¿Pero qué creéis que estáis haciendo?!$u"/faceDirection Pam 1/faceDirection Pam 3/faceDirection Pam 0/speak Pam "¡Parad! ¡Lo tenía todo exactamente como a mí me gusta!$u"/move Penny 2 0 2/pause 500/emote Penny 28/pause 500/speak Penny "Mamá, la casa está hecha un desastre.@ y yo solo intentábamos ordenar un poco.#$b#*Snif, snif* ¿Has vuelto a ir al Salón? Hueles a cerveza...$s"/pause 300/move Pam -1 0 3/emote Pam 12/pause 400/speak Pam "¡No es asunto tuyo adónde vaya o deje de ir!$4"/pause 500/speak Penny "¡Sí que es asunto mío! ¡No quiero que te destroces a ti misma!$a#$b#¿No te das cuenta de que tus acciones también me afectan a mí? ¡No seas tan egoísta!$a"/faceDirection Pam 0/shake Pam 5000/pause 600/speak Pam "¿Egoísta? ¡¿Te ofrezco techo y ropa y me llamas egoísta?! Eres una desagradecida...$u"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection Pam 1/faceDirection Penny 1/move farmer -2 0 2/move farmer 0 2 3/pause 500/speak Pam "Será mejor que te marches. Siento que hayas tenido que ver eso.$4"/pause 500/move farmer 0 3 2/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 700/move farmer 0 13 2/warp farmer -40 -40/playSound doorClose/pause 500/move Pam 0 -1 1/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 3/speak Pam "Es un gran chico...^Es una gran chica..."/speak Pam "¡Pero no quiero que le pidas a nadie que limpie mi casa! ¡Me da vergüenza! ¿Lo entiendes?$4"/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 600/showFrame Penny 23/pause 700/speak Penny "Sí, mamá...$s"/pause 1000/mail PennyCleanTrailer/end warpOut
Entries.36/f Penny 1500: musicboxsong/9 7/farmer -30 30 0 Penny 9 7 0/skippable/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 13 24/move farmer 0 -15 0/pause 400/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 300/speak Penny "¡@, has venido en el momento perfecto!#$b#¡Casi he terminado de cocinar una receta que me he inventado!$h"/pause 400/move farmer 0 -2 3/faceDirection Penny 1/move farmer -3 0 3/speak Penny "Dame un segundo para terminar."/pause 200/faceDirection Penny 0/pause 200/animate Penny false true 120 29 30/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/stopAnimation Penny/pause 500/playSound openBox/showFrame Penny 29/pause 400/playSound furnace/showFrame Penny 30/pause 1500/playSound clank/faceDirection Penny 0/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1 true/showFrame Penny 28/speak Penny "Toma, prueba un poco."/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/farmerEat 200/showFrame Penny 4/pause 2500/stopAnimation farmer/pause 500/playSound gulp/animate farmer false true 350 104 105/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite pennyCook/pause 1500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/speak Penny "$q 72 null#¿Y bien...?#$r 72 50 event_cook1#(Fingir) ¡Mmm! ¡Qué cosa más rica!#$r 73 -50 event_cook2#Uh... ¿Me pones el resto para llevar?#$r 73 0 event_cook3#Desde luego es un plato único... ¿Cómo has logrado esta textura tan gomosa?"/pause 500/speak Penny "$p 72#Ey, como has sido la primera persona en probarlo, lo voy a llamar «Chili de @».$h|Bueno, supongo que la receta ha sido un fracaso...$s"/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 600/speak Penny "Um... ¿Vemos una película o algo?"/pause 500/move farmer 5 0 0 true/move Penny 5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Penny "Gracias por hacer la cata.$h"

Entries.35/f Penny 1000: 50s/-1000 -1000/farmer -30 30 0 Penny 12 7 0 Pam -100 -100 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite pennyMess/viewport 12 7 true/pause 1000/speak Penny "ああ、もう…あちこちぐっちゃぐちゃ。$s"/pause 500/warp farmer 13 24/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer -1 0 3/move farmer 0 -14 0/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/emote Penny 16/pause 300/speak Penny "@！ああ…散らかっててごめんなさいね。これから片づけるところだったの。$u"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 600/emote Penny 32/pause 300/speak Penny "手伝ってくれるの？ほんとに？$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Penny "それじゃ、あなたはあっちをおねがい。わたしはキッチンをそうじするから。"/move farmer 2 0 1/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 1 0 1/move Penny -1 0 0/animate Penny false true 100 24 25/animate farmer false true 100 35/pause 200/playSound dwop/removeSprite 16 6/pause 200/move Penny -1 0 0/animate Penny false true 100 24 25/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 1200/stopAnimation Penny/removeSprite 10 5/playSound dwop/move Penny -1 0 0/animate Penny false true 100 24 25/pause 900/animate farmer false true 100 41/pause 300/playSound dwop/removeSprite 15 5/stopAnimation farmer/pause 1400/stopAnimation Penny/move Penny 1 0 0/pause 800/warp Pam 13 24/playSound doorClose/move Pam 0 -1 0/move Pam -1 0 3/move Pam 0 -15 0/stopMusic/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Pam 1/pause 500/faceDirection Pam 3/speak Pam "いったいなにやってんだい？！$u"/faceDirection Pam 1/faceDirection Pam 3/faceDirection Pam 0/speak Pam "やめな！せっかく居心地よくしてあったのに！$u"/move Penny 2 0 2/pause 500/emote Penny 28/pause 500/speak Penny "母さん、家があんなじゃ、どこになにがあるかもわからないでしょ。@とわたしで、すこしきれいにしようとしただけだよ。#$b#（クンクン）…酒場に行ってたの？ビールくさい…$s"/pause 300/move Pam -1 0 3/emote Pam 12/pause 400/speak Pam "あたしがどこに行ったって、お前にゃ関係ないだろう！$4"/pause 500/speak Penny "関係あるに決まってるでしょ！自分の体くらい大事にしてよ！$a#$b#母さんのとばっちりがわたしに来てないとでも思ってるの？自分勝手にするのもいいかげんにして！$a"/faceDirection Pam 0/shake Pam 5000/pause 600/speak Pam "自分勝手だぁ？雨風しのげる場所に住ませて、服だって世話してやってんのに、あたしが自分勝手だって！？この恩知らずの…$u"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection Pam 1/faceDirection Penny 1/move farmer -2 0 2/move farmer 0 2 3/pause 500/speak Pam "もう行きな。こんなトコ見せてすまないね、若いの。$4"/pause 500/move farmer 0 3 2/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 700/move farmer 0 13 2/warp farmer -40 -40/playSound doorClose/pause 500/move Pam 0 -1 1/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 3/speak Pam "やさしい若者だねえ…^やさしいお嬢さんだねえ…"/speak Pam "だがね、ウチのそうじを手伝ってくれなんて、よその人にたのんでほしくないんだよ！みっともないだろう！わかったかい？$4"/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 600/showFrame Penny 23/pause 700/speak Penny "…ええ、お母さん。$s"/pause 1000/mail PennyCleanTrailer/end warpOut
Entries.36/f Penny 1500: musicboxsong/9 7/farmer -30 30 0 Penny 9 7 0/skippable/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 13 24/move farmer 0 -15 0/pause 400/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 300/speak Penny "@、ちょうどよかった！#$b#あとちょっとで、あたらしく考えた料理ができあがるところだったの！$h"/pause 400/move farmer 0 -2 3/faceDirection Penny 1/move farmer -3 0 3/speak Penny "ちゃちゃっとしあげするからね。"/pause 200/faceDirection Penny 0/pause 200/animate Penny false true 120 29 30/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/stopAnimation Penny/pause 500/playSound openBox/showFrame Penny 29/pause 400/playSound furnace/showFrame Penny 30/pause 1500/playSound clank/faceDirection Penny 0/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1 true/showFrame Penny 28/speak Penny "どうぞ、味見してみて。"/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/farmerEat 200/showFrame Penny 4/pause 2500/stopAnimation farmer/pause 500/playSound gulp/animate farmer false true 350 104 105/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite pennyCook/pause 1500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/speak Penny "$q 72 null#…どう？#$r 72 50 event_cook1#（ウソ）うーん！おいしーい！#$r 73 -50 event_cook2#あの…残りをもって行ってもいい？#$r 73 0 event_cook3#えっと、すごくおもしろい味だね…どうやればゴムみたいにかたくなるの？"/pause 500/speak Penny "$p 72#じゃあ、はじめて食べた人の名前をとって、この料理の名前は「チリ・デ・@」にしましょう。$h|このレシピ、失敗だったみたいだね…$s"/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 600/speak Penny "あ、そうだ…ねえ、映画でも見ない？"/pause 500/move farmer 5 0 0 true/move Penny 5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Penny "味見役になってくれてありがとう。$h"

Eu tinha organizado tudo do jeito que gosto!$u"/move Penny 2 0 2/pause 500/emote Penny 28/pause 500/speak Penny "Mãe, a casa está uma bagunça. @ e eu estávamos tentando organizar um pouco as coisas.#$b#*Sniff*, *Sniff*... Você estava no saloon agora? Que cheiro de cerveja...$s"/pause 300/move Pam -1 0 3/emote Pam 12/pause 400/speak Pam "Não é da sua conta onde vou!$4"/pause 500/speak Penny "É da MINHA conta! Não quero você se destruindo!$a#$b#Você não percebe que suas escolhas me afetam? Pare de ser tão egoísta!$a"/faceDirection Pam 0/shake Pam 5000/pause 600/speak Pam "Egoísta? Eu te dou um teto para morar e roupas para vestir e EU sou egoísta?! Mas que ingrata!...$u"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection Pam 1/faceDirection Penny 1/move farmer -2 0 2/move farmer 0 2 3/pause 500/speak Pam "É melhor você sair. Desculpe por ter visto isso.$4"/pause 500/move farmer 0 3 2/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 700/move farmer 0 13 2/warp farmer -40 -40/playSound doorClose/pause 500/move Pam 0 -1 1/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 3/speak Pam "Ele é um ótimo rapaz...^Ela é uma moça..."/speak Pam "Mas, temos que resolver isso sozinhas! É muito embaraçoso! Entendeu?$4"/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 600/showFrame Penny 23/pause 700/speak Penny "Sim, mãe.$s"/pause 1000/mail PennyCleanTrailer/end warpOut

Entries.35/f Penny 1000: 50s/-1000 -1000/farmer -30 30 0 Penny 12 7 0 Pam -100 -100 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite pennyMess/viewport 12 7 true/pause 1000/speak Penny "Уф-ф-ф... Здесь так грязно.$s"/pause 500/warp farmer 13 24/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer -1 0 3/move farmer 0 -14 0/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/emote Penny 16/pause 300/speak Penny "@! Entries.36/f Penny 1500: musicboxsong/9 7/farmer -30 30 0 Penny 9 7 0/skippable/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 13 24/move farmer 0 -15 0/pause 400/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 300/speak Penny "@，你来的正好！#$b#我马上就要完成我的新料理了！$h"/pause 400/move farmer 0 -2 3/faceDirection Penny 1/move farmer -3 0 3/speak Penny "再一下下就好。"/pause 200/faceDirection Penny 0/pause 200/animate Penny false true 120 29 30/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/playSound crafting/pause 320/stopAnimation Penny/pause 500/playSound openBox/showFrame Penny 29/pause 400/playSound furnace/showFrame Penny 30/pause 1500/playSound clank/faceDirection Penny 0/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1 true/showFrame Penny 28/speak Penny "来，给你尝尝。"/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/farmerEat 200/showFrame Penny 4/pause 2500/stopAnimation farmer/pause 500/playSound gulp/animate farmer false true 350 104 105/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite pennyCook/pause 1500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/speak Penny "$q 72 null#……怎么样？#$r 72 50 event_cook1#（说谎）嗯嗯！真好吃！#$r 73 -50 event_cook2#呃……我能把剩下的带走吗？#$r 73 0 event_cook3#真是特别的味道……你是怎么把它做得那么耐人寻味的？"/pause 500/speak Penny "$p 72#嘿，既然你是第一个尝这道菜的人，我准备给这道菜起名叫“辣 @”。$h|好吧，我想这次料理失败了……$s"/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 600/speak Penny "呃……所以我们要不要一起看个电影什么的？"/pause 500/move farmer 5 0 0 true/move Penny 5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Penny "谢谢你帮我试菜。$h"
